title: Why central banks can’t compete with Bitcoin
itunes:title: Why central banks can’t compete with Bitcoin
description: Bitcoin influencer and host of  Natalie Brunell joins the show today to discuss all things Bitcoin. She shares her journey from award-winning journalist to Bitcoin enthusiast… what she’s learned from interviewing brilliant guests… and a recap of the Bitcoin 2022 conference in Miami. She also explains the benefits of regulation… whether she likes any altcoins… and why a central banking coin is a terrible idea. In this episode:  Why journalist Natalie Brunell turned to Bitcoin [1:40] What Natalie learned from Bitcoin bear Peter Schiff [7:50] Recapping the Bitcoin 2022 conference in Miami [10:35] The pros of regulation… And the cons of a central bank coin [15:25] Can any altcoins compete with Bitcoin? [19:15]  Enjoyed this episode?
